phrases: Misaki-sama cannot come to the phone right now.
I am taking the afternoon flight to San Francisco.
Yes, I am supposed to give a presentation at a game conference.
Let us move forward with your idea for the battles.
Now, we just have to write up a pitch for the title review board.
who drew this to do some additional illustrations for us?
I think including more drawings would help us with the review board.
No, I will ask Shiina about it.
Then, let us call it a day.
Planning to go on a date after this?
The results of my sister's exam come out this afternoon.
Sensei, you are working again today?
I have a meeting I do not want to go to.
Usually she says something like, Why do not you go in my place?
But I am changing and heading straight back out again.
Why did you tag along, Shiina?
Whether Yuko passes or not is important.
It is related to my plans for the future.
You really like that plan, do not you?
That is the one where we go out!
B-By the way, Aoyama, when do the results of your audition come out?
B-Between the end of February and the middle of March.
Then, do not act like you are angry.
She sounds it, does not she, Aoyama?
You are being friendly with Nanami again.
Shiina, I have a favor to ask you.
Would you draw more illustrations for
But if it will get in the way of your manga
Then, I will do my best.
Well, not much we can do.
No matter how many times I check, you still failed.
All the other numbers in the nineties passed, but 99 is not up there.
You must not have scored very well on the test.
Why cannot you be nicer to me when I am in pain?
When can I crack open my ball with the congratulations on passing banner?
And what the heck is that, anyway?
I pulled three all-nighters making it!
I am breaking it open now!
Do your best on the prefectural school exam.
My younger brother, Iori, applied to the music department.
Looks like Misaki is not with you?
He came to tell his homeroom teacher that he passed his exam.
Mitaka really intends to leave Misaki behind and go to Osaka.
She did not even get to see him on Valentine's Day.
There are only two weeks left before graduation.
I cannot believe the two of them will graduate like this.
I will go back and get her!
I will keep Jin-san from leaving!
Do you think it will be all right?
I cannot look after them all the time.
Mashiro-chan, that is some face you are pulling.
Could you come with us for a bit?
Do whatever you want with me.
Why did you bring me here?
You are not actually confessing your love to me, are you?
That is what she should be doing.
She will forget about me soon enough.
Would it be better if I said I was joking?
What else am I supposed to say?
You are not acting like your usual self.
And what is my usual self?
Always cool, always smart, capable of anything,
mature, dependable, and always gives me advice.
That is the person I expect you to be!
How can you think I would give up on you and Misaki-senpai?
What if someone takes Misaki-senpai away from you?
I am asking you whether you would mind...
if Misaki-senpai gave all of her being to another man!
Do not think you can say whatever you like!
You are the one making me say it!
I could not take any more!
I did not even know if I would get into college!
I could not focus on anything because of Misaki!
It is not easy for me to confess my feelings to Misaki!
I need to be prepared to spend the rest of my life with her!
How can you say that when you have always been ready?
I feel like I am dying.
I can almost see your panties.
You have grown up a bit if you are shamelessly looking up girls' skirts now.
Why do not you stop this if you like her so much?
Have not you been listening to me?
You are full of energy, Nanamin.
Because I am finishing this right now.
I am going to do it!
You are the one who taught me not to hold my feelings in!
That is why I did my best.
Senpai, are you going to do another...
hundred laps around that same circle?
I do not want to either,
Let us see who wants to play!
I do not want to play if you are playing.
I thought Jin would always be by my side.
If you do not get up, I am giving you a good morning kiss!
Because he does not want other people to see you.
Misaki, let us take a picture.
Our parents get so excited over everything Misaki does.
And as her older sister, you are not happy about it.
They even bought a new camera.
Anyway, are not you going to change?
I was waiting for you to leave.
How cheeky of you to worry about me.
it would have been better if I would realized how I felt sooner.
We have finished our first semester!
I cannot get my head around the fact she is a brainiac.
Mitaka-kun, are you going home already?
We are off to sing karaoke.
Do you want to join us?
Some other girls from our class are coming.
Is there anyone cuter than her?
I said I have got something I have to do today.
She is kind of sexy, is not she?
I wonder if she would let me
What do you think you are doing?
There is nothing we can do about her.
You have your work cut out with that one.
Did you get in a fight again?
How many times is this now?
I cannot watch Misaki hurt you anymore.
Your heart just leaped, did not it?
Maybe I would not have been running in circles if I would noticed sooner.
She is been avoiding me lately.
She will not answer her phone and she does not answer my texts.
I am too afraid to go see Jin.
I feel like I would say something mean if I did.
I thought I might be able to see him after I finished this scene,
but I just cannot finish it.
I do not want to finish it!
I am really glad I came to Suimei High.
Did you come to deliver your last words, Master?
Suimei University of the Arts High School?
There are no aliens like you in this tiny town.
But if you go to that school, you might find others like you...
who have found their way onto this planet.
Why do not you try applying here?
That is when I realized Misaki knew she was alone.
Why did you apply to Suimei High?
I am thinking of applying to Suimei, too.
Leaving home and living in a dorm sounds like fun, does not it?
I am kind of interested in attending an art school, too.
You are always so worried about Misaki.
Misaki's the only one you see.
I thought you would at least look at me.
I am nothing more than a Misaki substitute to you.
You are afraid you will hurt Misaki.
You want to keep her pure and untouched by your side forever.
Is not that why you are with me instead?
I probably just could not ignore Misaki.
Mitaka-senpai's going far away this time!
I am really glad I came to Suimei High.
I am glad I met you guys.
Knowing Misaki has people around her who will get angry for her sake...
She is definitely not going to show now.
We heard there was a fight...
What are you doing on a test announcement day?
There is an explanation for all of this!
I am sure you do not!
I am telling you to open this door!
What a bunch of meddling underclassmen.
Well, I guess it is not so bad once in a while.
I am going to Osaka in April.
So, Misaki, do not worry about me.
Do what you really want to do.
You must have realized it when we all worked on Nyapollon.
You had fun, did not you?
Mashiron's work was amazing, and every day was exciting.
The Dragon did everything I asked him to do, too.
Then, you know my scripts are not good enough.
Your scripts are not good enough.
You were disappointed every time I finished one.
Four years from now, I will come back and write scripts...
good enough to be hired by Kamiigusa Misaki.
If you do not want it, pitch it.
I will never take it off.
Come and join us in the faculty office for a while!
Does a while mean five minutes?
You are really going to get it today!
Thanks for the last three years.
You will get in even more trouble later.
Sorata's the one who will get in trouble.
Third years can come and go as we please,
and I will not be coming to school tomorrow.
You had all of that worked out?!
Come on, let us go home.
There are people on the roof.
Please look out for them while doing your rounds!
It took a long time to get here.
What are you two talking about?
We were wondering how far we can go.
Living in Sakura Hall makes you think like that.
The board of trustees have decided to demolish Sakura Hall...
at the end of the year.
What was Sakura Hall like before I showed up?
And Sorata was slouched over like a soggy biscuit.
